word_mean_info__list.difference: 强调客观存在的真实性，没有任何虚假。
一般用于肯定或证实对方所说的话，多承接前言，也用来加强或肯定自己说话的语气。
主要用于强调与事实或现实不相违背，也可表示不快、惊奇或某种含蓄的怀疑。
侧重于实际的事，而不是凭空想象或推测的事。

bilingual.target: 这真正地是令人羡慕的爱。
但是我真正地喜欢印第安食物。

bilingual.source: I think this must be understood really.
bilingual.target: 我想必须真正地了解这一点。

bilingual.source: And you should really think deeply do you really want to have that kind of liberation.
bilingual.target: 而你，应该真正地深入去思维，自己真的想要那样的解脱吗？

bilingual.source: Now I know calmness. Real calmness is clearly seeing, really knowing and really understanding.
bilingual.target: 现在我知道了，真正的平静是清楚地看见、真正地知道和真正的了悟。

bilingual.source: "It is what you really, really want," said Vovó.
bilingual.target: “是你真正非常想要的东西，”沃沃说。

list.abstract: really（英 [ˈriːəli]，美 [ˈriːəli]），英语单词，作副词为真正地；确实地；实际上。作动词为真的；真是的；的确如此。短语搭配有not really（不完全是）。例句为“You can really get into the charm of old things by visiting a junk shop.（逛逛旧货店，你可以真正领略到旧物的魅力。）” really相关近义词有actually、truly等。
REALLY元利科技专业从事流体控制产品的研发与制造，并具有进出口权的高新技术企业。在自主研发和生产气动增压泵、气动同轴阀、气动推拉器及各类控制系统设计和集成过程中，成为德国盖米GEMU、美国ASCO-NUMATICS、美国BARKSDALE等著名品牌的一级代理商。

yingyinNormal.en: As we stood there, I realized that all these years we never really talked.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当我们站在那儿，我意识到这么些年我们没有真正地交谈过。
也白得太夸张了。

yingyinNormal.en: I just, I really, really, really liked having stripy legs.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但是我真的非常非常喜欢条纹连裤袜。
我首先想到的是 真的吗？真的。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《Facebook COO谢丽尔·桑德伯格哈佛演讲》

yingyinNormal.zh: 你真重。真的? 谢谢你!
是啊，其实他们不快乐。是吗？
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《Night at the Museum: Secret of the Tomb》

yingyinNormal.zh: 布莱尔，这真的很浪漫，真的。

yingyinNormal.en: Did you really? How did it go? How useful really…
yingyinNormal.zh: 真的吗？车子性能还好吗？好的不得了……
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets》

yingyinNormal.en: Politics isn't really my area of expertise. Really?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我对政治可不感冒。是么？
真的吗？那个科学家？真的吗？钱德？继续说。

yingyinNormal.en: Really? Because I think about you all the time. Really?
yingyinNormal.zh: 真的吗？因为我也常常想到你。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, he was really, really scary. Good detective work.
yingyinNormal.zh: 有，他非常，非常吓人。大侦探明察秋毫啊。
是吗？这我还真是没想过。
真的有法尔科这个人吗？
你们真的让我们都变傻了！
你真的，真的是这么想的吗？
噢，这些片子很旧啊。
我的天啊。你真的是……
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets》

yingyinNormal.zh: 这真的很难选择。
我是挺喜欢我的头发的。真的吗？

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Our mental health doesn't <highlight>really</highlight> go anywhere; like the sun behind a cloud, it can be temporarily hidden from view.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们的心理健康并没有真正地消失，就像云层背后的太阳，它可能暂时隐藏于视线之外。

examination_example.sentence: Then the problem is not <highlight>really</highlight> about technology, but rather, "how do we innovate our institutions and our work practices?"
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那么问题实际上并不在于技术，而是在于“我们如何革新我们的制度和工作实践？”

examination_example.sentence: If the subjects quickly chose a falsely flattering image — which most did — they genuinely believed it was <highlight>really</highlight> how they looked.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果受试者迅速选择了一张虚假的美照——大部分受试者都这么做了——他们真的相信这张照片就是他们实际的样子。

sense_info_list.en: used to emphasize sth you are saying or an opinion you are giving

examination_example.sentence: "Overtime is not attractive to this generation. They <highlight>really</highlight> want to live their lives," she says.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她说：“加班对这一代人没有吸引力。他们确实想过自己的生活。”

examination_example.sentence: Finally, there is perspective, which involves acknowledging that in the grand scheme of life, one lecture <highlight>really</highlight> doesn't matter.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最后，要有权衡轻重的能力，这包括承认在生命的宏伟蓝图中，一次讲课真的无关紧要。

examination_example.sentence: Everyone says this, but it <highlight>really</highlight> is a top tip for frugal eaters.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每个人都这样说，但对节俭的食客来说，这的确是个绝佳的窍门。?

examination_example.sentence: Every person is a <highlight>really</highlight> good book to read, or to have a conversation with!
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每个人都是一本非常值得阅读或与之交谈的好书！

examination_example.sentence: "It is <highlight>really</highlight> important to understand and try and tease out what is the human connection with fire today. "
examination_example.sentence_trans: “了解并尝试梳理清楚当今人类与火的关联，这很重要。”

examination_example.sentence: On a <highlight>really</highlight> good day, it no longer feels as if you're "making time to read," but just reading, and making time for everything else.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在十分美好的一天，你不再觉得自己在“腾出时间阅读”，而只是阅读，并腾出时间做其他事情。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: I'm excited to explain to the audience what my book is <highlight>really</highlight> about.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我很高兴能向观众解释我的书到底是关于什么的。

examination_example.sentence: Convincing someone to change their mind is <highlight>really</highlight> the process of convincing them to change their tribe.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 说服别人改变主意其实就是说服他们改变自己的部落。

examination_example.sentence: Employee engagement, meanwhile, was assessed with statements like "I <highlight>really</highlight> throw myself into my work."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 与此同时，员工参与度是通过“我真的全身心地投入到工作中去了”这样的陈述来评估的。

examination_example.sentence: I had to go to the hospital to get some antibiotics as I <highlight>really</highlight> wasn't getting any better.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我不得不去医院注射一些抗生素，因为我真的没有任何好转。

examination_example.sentence: Preschool children <highlight>really</highlight> don't get the moral of the story.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 学龄前儿童真的不明白这个故事的寓意。

examination_example.sentence: On days when you're <highlight>really</highlight> reluctant to brave the world, Draper suggests selecting sentimental items of clothing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当你真的不愿意勇敢面对世界的时候，德雷珀建议选择感性的衣服。

examination_example.sentence: I have the number of a <highlight>really</highlight> good, affordable computer repair shop at home.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我家里有一家价格非常实惠的电脑维修店。

examination_example.sentence: It's important to have a wide skill set as many startups and small companies are moving <highlight>really</highlight> fast.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 拥有广泛的技能非常重要，因为许多初创公司和小公司的发展速度非常快。

word_usage.usage:
really在句中不可与其所修饰的词隔开，因其位置不同可能会导致含义上的变化。
示例：We really don't like him. 
我们确实不喜欢他。
We don't really like him. 
我们不大喜欢他。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: And kids <highlight>really</highlight> learn better when they're actively engaged and have to <highlight>really</highlight> discover things.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当孩子们积极投入并不得不真正发现事物时，他们会学得更好。

examination_example.sentence: And I <highlight>really</highlight> think my skills and abilities deserve a higher salary.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 而且我真的认为我的技能和能力应该得到更高的薪水。

examination_example.sentence: Can doing one's homework <highlight>really</highlight> steer families to the best places?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 做作业真的能把家庭引向最好的地方吗？

examination_example.sentence: Everything else is <highlight>really</highlight> difficult to do experimentally.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 其他一切都很难通过实验来完成。

examination_example.sentence: He's a <highlight>really</highlight> nice guy, and he knows a lot about cars.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他是一个非常好的人，他也对汽车很了解。

examination_example.sentence: He's actually in the construction business, which was <highlight>really</highlight> helpful.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他实际上从事非常有帮助的建筑业。

word_usage.usage:
really在句中不可与其所修饰的词隔开，因其位置不同可能会导致含义上的变化。
示例：We really don't like him. 
我们确实不喜欢他。
We don't really like him. 
我们不大喜欢他。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: When I was eighteen, I decided that I <highlight>really</highlight> preferred contemporary dance and that I wanted to do it professionally.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我18岁的时候，我确定我真的更喜欢现代舞，并且我想要成为一名专业舞者。

examination_example.sentence: The result is that people stop driving before they <highlight>really</highlight> need to.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 结果就是人们在真正需要之前就停止了驾驶。

examination_example.sentence: This course is <highlight>really</highlight> difficult.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这门课真的很难。

examination_example.sentence: In fact, so much traveling was <highlight>really</highlight> a good thing because it made us close.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 事实上，这么多的旅行真的是一件好事，因为它让我们更加亲密。

examination_example.sentence: "It's a <highlight>really</highlight> great experience for kids," said a neighbor in an interview with the local newspaper.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一位邻居在接受当地报纸采访时说：“对孩子们来说，这真是一次很棒的经历。”

examination_example.sentence: It's not <highlight>really</highlight> a good idea to use too many small color pieces.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 使用太多的小色块并不是一个好主意。

sense_info_list.en: used to say that something is certain

examination_example.sentence: You <highlight>really</highlight> ought to take a boat down the Amazon.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你真应该乘船沿亚马逊河而下。

examination_example.sentence: I <highlight>really</highlight> am ranked the lowest.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我的确是排名最低的。

examination_example.sentence: After doing some research, I believed that we could <highlight>really</highlight> do something for those kids.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在做了一些研究后，我相信我们的确可以为这些孩子做点什么。

examination_example.sentence: I didn't <highlight>really</highlight> understand his world either: He was a livestock trucker, and I thought that I would surpass anything he had accomplished.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我其实也没有理解他的世界。他是一个牲畜运输卡车司机，我认为我会超越他所完成的任何事情。

examination_example.sentence: Of those Australians who still have a landline, a third concede that it's not <highlight>really</highlight> necessary, they're keeping it as a security blanket.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在那些仍然有固定电话的澳大利亚人中，三分之一的人承认这其实不是必要的，他们把它作为一种安全保障。

sense_info_list.en: used to express interest, surprise,or anger

examination_example.sentence: But does one plastic straw or cup <highlight>really</highlight> make a difference?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是一根塑料吸管或一个杯子真的有区别吗？

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Although Simon has done well in his studies, he still works <highlight>really</highlight> hard.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管西蒙学习成绩很好，但他仍然非常努力。

examination_example.sentence: I <highlight>really</highlight> want to be a scientist.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我非常想成为一名科学家。

examination_example.sentence: The man was <highlight>really</highlight> good at fishing and he could catch a full basket of fish in a short time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这个人确实很擅长钓鱼，他可以在短时间内钓到满满一篮子鱼。

examination_example.sentence: Sometimes we forget what's <highlight>really</highlight> necessary in life.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有时候我们会忘记生活中真正需要的东西。

examination_example.sentence: But if the animal could get into the field, it would find that the grass is <highlight>really</highlight> the same.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是如果动物能进入田野，它会发现草真的是一样的。

examination_example.sentence: They <highlight>really</highlight> need more information to decide.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们真的需要更多的信息来决定。

examination_example.sentence: "<highlight>Really</highlight>? How long can I live?" The boy asked his mother again.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “真的吗？我还能活多久？”男孩又问他妈妈。

examination_example.sentence: No, not <highlight>really</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不，不算是。

examination_example.sentence: Not <highlight>really</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不见得。

word_usage.usage:
really在句中不可与其所修饰的词隔开，因其位置不同可能会导致含义上的变化。
示例：We really don't like him. 
我们确实不喜欢他。
We don't really like him. 
我们不大喜欢他。
